mapper.insert: insert into reviews values ((select NVL(MAX(rvpdId) + 1, 1) from reviews),#{rvmemId},#{rvpdId},#{rvContent},#{rvImg},sysdate,sysdate,0,0)
mapper.update: update reviews set rvContent=#{rvContent}, rvImg=#{rvImg}, rvUpdDate=sysdate where rvNo=#{rvNo}
update reviews set rvNice=rvNice+1 where rvNo=#{rvNo}
update reviews set rvReport=rvReport+1 where rvNo=#{rvNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reviews where rvpdId = #{getPdId}
mapper.update: update reviews set rvNice=rvNice-1 where rvNo=#{rvNo}
update reviews set rvReport=rvReport-1 where rvNo=#{rvNo}
